fields.Name: Hextech Gunblade
fields.Description: +40 Attack Damage +80 Ability Power +10% Life Steal UNIQUE Passive: +20% Spell Vamp UNIQUE Passive: Basic attacks (on hit) and single-target spells against champions reduce the cooldown of this item by 3 seconds. UNIQUE Active: Deals 150 (+40% of Ability Power) magic damage and slows the target champion's Movement Speed by 40% for 2 seconds (60 second cooldown). (Spell Vamp: Abilities heal for a percentage of the damage they deal. Area of Effect spells only grant one-third of the healing from Spell Vamp.)
